doc.title: Bracia
doc.plot: Two Polish kids Pawel (13) and his older brother Marek (17) explore abandoned factories stealing old metal to sell it for a few zloty. Pawel desperately tries to win Marek's recognition. He believes blindly in Marek's responsibility and infallibility. Marek is not able to fulfill this role and hides his ignorance and uncertainty behind aggressiveness. While Marek investigates an apparently unguarded factory, Pawel stays outside to keep an eye on the unusually quite surroundings...
